page.title: 17BOYS PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content: "MOVING TARGETS".Game for up to eight players.Four boys move in a dodging movement in front of the school wall. These are the moving targets.The other boys have a tennis ball which they try to aim at the legs of the "Target".If they score a hit the thrower swaps places with the "Target". "HAND TENNIS".Two teams of 3-5 players stand opposite a central line in a re- ctangular area.Ball is hit by a player in Team A to a player in Team B using his hand.Ball is allowed to bounce and returned to other side.Game continues till ball is missed or out of play.The winning hit scores one.Team wins when they score ten first. "LINE IT".One person is "IT" and the rest of the group run along the lines (grids marked on playground).If you are caught or fall of the lines you then become "IT">
